about_the_game:
Ayako's Mission is a 2D Top-Down Shoot'em Up game based on the story of the war breaking out between the two territories called, AY Corp and ATO Corp.

This is the year of 2069 when the war broke out between the two territories, the AY Corp and the ATO Corp because of the border disputes. The ATO Corp claims the Agon island, situated near the border of the two territories, as theirs even though the island has always been the integral part of the AY Corp. The ATO Corp sent the advanced Fighter planes in the hope of forcefully taking over the island violating the Air space of the AY Corp. But soon after the invasion, they were met with a strong response from the AY Corp Air Force Department. It was reported that the ATO Corp built enemy bases and turrets secretly in the border area of the island and was preparing for the war.

The leader of AY Corp. commanded Ayako, one of the best Air Force Officers, to eliminate the enemy fighter planes invading the territory and to destroy the turrets built along the border. A special Super Jet, equipped with Laser weapons, plasma-powered machine gun, and giant plasma cannon, called 'AYCODE 5564' was built using the latest defense technology, especially for Ayako, in order to eliminate the enemy forces during war times.

You play as Ayako, the Air Officer, operating 'AYCODE 5564' plane and your mission is to protect your own territory at any cost. Will you be able to be successful in your mission?

Key Features:


  • 36 Levels to play!
  • 3 Firing modes including primary, secondary and giant plasma!
  • The various kinds of enemy Airplanes, and Ground Turrets!
  • 3 Challenging Boss Battles!
  • Collect items like health balloons, ammo, and lives!
  • 6 Lives to start with!
  • Simple controls!



Note: I am a solo indie game developer and I have created all of the graphics, artwork, animation, character design, programming except for the music. I hope you will enjoy the game.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains the following content:

-Violence

detailed_description:
Ayako's Mission is a 2D Top-Down Shoot'em Up game based on the story of the war breaking out between the two territories called, AY Corp and ATO Corp.

This is the year of 2069 when the war broke out between the two territories, the AY Corp and the ATO Corp because of the border disputes. The ATO Corp claims the Agon island, situated near the border of the two territories, as theirs even though the island has always been the integral part of the AY Corp. The ATO Corp sent the advanced Fighter planes in the hope of forcefully taking over the island violating the Air space of the AY Corp. But soon after the invasion, they were met with a strong response from the AY Corp Air Force Department. It was reported that the ATO Corp built enemy bases and turrets secretly in the border area of the island and was preparing for the war.

The leader of AY Corp. commanded Ayako, one of the best Air Force Officers, to eliminate the enemy fighter planes invading the territory and to destroy the turrets built along the border. A special Super Jet, equipped with Laser weapons, plasma-powered machine gun, and giant plasma cannon, called 'AYCODE 5564' was built using the latest defense technology, especially for Ayako, in order to eliminate the enemy forces during war times.

You play as Ayako, the Air Officer, operating 'AYCODE 5564' plane and your mission is to protect your own territory at any cost. Will you be able to be successful in your mission?

Key Features:


  • 36 Levels to play!
  • 3 Firing modes including primary, secondary and giant plasma!
  • The various kinds of enemy Airplanes, and Ground Turrets!
  • 3 Challenging Boss Battles!
  • Collect items like health balloons, ammo, and lives!
  • 6 Lives to start with!
  • Simple controls!



Note: I am a solo indie game developer and I have created all of the graphics, artwork, animation, character design, programming except for the music. I hope you will enjoy the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 1 Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB of Video Memory
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Compatible Sound Card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 Ghz+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB of Video Memory
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Compatible Sound Card

name: Ayako's Mission

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 1 Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB of Video Memory, Capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB of Video Memory, Capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Ayako's Mission is a 2D Top-Down Shoot'em Up game based on the story of the war breaking out between the two territories called, AY Corp and ATO Corp. where you must defend your territory against the invaders.
